stories.title: AI-Powered Diagnostic Platform
stories.description: Revolutionary medical imaging platform that reduces diagnosis time by 75% using advanced AI algorithms.

stories.title: Remote Patient Monitoring
stories.description: IoT-enabled healthcare solution that monitors patients remotely and provides real-time health insights.

stories.title: Smart Drug Delivery System
stories.description: Precision drug delivery platform that optimizes medication timing and dosage for individual patients.

stories.title: Telemedicine Platform
stories.description: Comprehensive telemedicine solution connecting patients with healthcare providers globally.

stories.title: Medical Data Analytics
stories.description: Advanced analytics platform that processes medical data to identify patterns and treatment outcomes.

stories.title: Surgical Robot Assistant
stories.description: AI-powered surgical assistance system that enhances precision and reduces operation time.
